<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="2",CHK=529161,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KK_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 13 23:58 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Governing
Law</font></u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">.<b>&#160; </b>Any dispute in the meaning, effect
or validity of this Warrant shall be resolved in accordance with the laws of
the State of Maryland without regard to the conflict of laws provisions
thereof.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Attorneys&#146;
Fees</font></u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
In the event that any suit or action is instituted under or in relation
to this Warrant, including without limitation to enforce any provision in this
Warrant, the prevailing party in such dispute shall be entitled to recover from
the losing party all fees, costs and expenses of enforcing any right of such
prevailing party under or with respect to this Warrant, including, without
limitation, such reasonable fees and expenses of attorneys and accountants,
which shall include, without limitation, all fees, costs and expenses of
appeals.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Entire
Agreement</font></u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; This Warrant and the exhibits hereto
constitute the entire agreement and understanding of the parties hereto with
respect to the subject matter hereof, and supersede all prior and
contemporaneous agreements and understandings, whether oral or written, between
the parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Binding
Effect</font></u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
This Warrant and the various rights and obligations arising hereunder
shall inure to the benefit of and be binding upon the Company and its
successors and assigns, and Holder and its successors. Holder may not assign
this Warrant or its rights or obligations hereunder without the express written
consent of the Company, which consent may be withheld, delayed or conditioned
in the sole and absolute discretion of the Company.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Waiver;
Consent</font></u><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
This Warrant may not be changed, amended, terminated, augmented,
rescinded or discharged (other than by performance), in whole or in part,
except by a writing executed by the Holder and the Company, and no waiver of
any of the provisions or conditions of this Warrant or any of the rights of the
Holder or the Company hereto shall be effective or binding unless such waiver
shall be in writing and signed by the party claimed to have given or consented
thereto.</font></h2>

<h2 align="left" style="color:black;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h2>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Remainder of the Page&nbsp;is Intentionally Left Blank</i></b>]</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT A</font></u></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">NOTICE OF EXERCISE</font></u></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To:</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Macerich
Company</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Holder hereby elects to
purchase
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Shares of the Company pursuant to the terms of the attached Warrant, and
tenders herewith payment of the Strike Price pursuant to the terms of the
Warrant. Defined terms used herein and not defined herein shall have the
meaning ascribed to them in the Warrant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Attached as <u>Exhibit&nbsp;A</u>
is an investment representation letter addressed to the Company and executed by
the Holder as required by Section&nbsp;13 of the Warrant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Please issue a new Warrant
for the unexercised portion of the attached Warrant, if any, in the name of the
Holder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Name:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="42%" valign="top" style="border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:none;border-right:none;border-top:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" colspan="3" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.08%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.26%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Title:</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="42%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="2",CHK=258458,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KK_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 13 23:58 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;A</font></u></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To:</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Macerich
Company</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with the
purchase by the Holder of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Shares of the Company, upon exercise of that certain Warrant dated as of September&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
2009, the Holder hereby represents and warrants as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Holder is an &#147;accredited
investor&#148; as that term is defined in Rule&nbsp;501 of Regulation D promulgated
under the Act.&#160; The Shares to be received
by the Holder upon exercise of the Warrant are being acquired for its own
account, not as a nominee or agent, and not with a view to resale or
distribution of any part thereof, and the Holder has no present intention of
selling, granting any participation in, or otherwise distributing the same.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Holder understands that
the Shares are characterized as &#147;restricted securities&#148; under the federal
securities laws inasmuch as they are being acquired from the Company in
transactions not involving a public offering, and that under such laws and
applicable regulations such securities may be resold without registration under
the Act, only in certain limited circumstances.&#160;
In this connection, the Holder represents and warrants that it is
familiar with Rule&nbsp;144 of the Act, as presently in effect, and understands
the resale limitations imposed by Rule&nbsp;144 and by the Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Holder understands the
instruments evidencing the Shares may bear the following legend:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE OFFER AND SALE OF THE
SECURITIES EVIDENCED BY THIS WARRANT CERTIFICATE HAVE NOT BEEN REGISTERED UNDER
THE SECURITIES ACT OF 1933, AS AMENDED (THE &#147;<u>ACT</u>&#148;), OR QUALIFIED UNDER
STATE SECURITIES LAWS, AND THEREFORE SUCH SECURITIES MAY&nbsp;NOT BE SOLD,
TRANSFERRED, ASSIGNED,&#160; HYPOTHECATED OR
OTHERWISE TRANSFERRED EXCEPT PURSUANT TO AN EFFECTIVE REGISTRATION STATEMENT
UNDER THE ACT, OR PROVIDED THAT SUCH SALE, TRANSFER, ASSIGNMENT OR
HYPOTHECATION IS EXEMPT FROM THE REGISTRATION REQUIREMENTS OF THE ACT AND THE
QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS OF THE RELEVANT STATE SECURITIES LAWS.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Defined terms used herein
and not defined herein shall have the meaning ascribed to them in the Warrant.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.26%;">

  </td>
  <td width="41%" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:41.82%;">

<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
10.1.12</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIRTEENTH AMENDMENT TO THE</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">AMENDED AND RESTATED</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">LIMITED PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT OF</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE MACERICH PARTNERSHIP, L.P.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS THIRTEENTH AMENDMENT (the <b>&#147;Amendment&#148;</b>)
TO THE AMENDED AND RESTATED LIMITED PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT DATED AS OF MARCH&nbsp;16,
1994, AMENDED AS OF AUGUST&nbsp;14, 1995, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF JUNE&nbsp;27,
1997, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF NOVEMBER&nbsp;16, 1997, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF
FEBRUARY&nbsp;25, 1998, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF FEBRUARY&nbsp;26, 1998, FURTHER
AMENDED AS OF JUNE&nbsp;17, 1998, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF DECEMBER&nbsp;23, 1998,
FURTHER AMENDED AS OF NOVEMBER&nbsp;9, 2000, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF
JULY&nbsp;26, 2002, FURTHER AMENDED AS OF OCTOBER 26, 2006, FURTHER AMENDED AS
OF MARCH&nbsp;16, 2007 AND FURTHER AMENDED AS OF APRIL 30, 2009 (the <b>&#147;Agreement&#148;</b>) OF THE MACERICH PARTNERSHIP,
L.P. (the <b>&#147;Partnership&#148;</b>) is dated
effective as of October&nbsp;29, 2009. All capitalized terms used herein and
not defined shall have the respective meanings ascribed to them in the
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, Section&nbsp;12.1(c)&nbsp;of
the Agreement permits The Macerich Company, the general partner of the
Partnership (the &#147;<b>General Partner</b>&#148;),
without the consent of the Limited Partners, to amend the Agreement, among
other things, to reflect a change that does not adversely affect the Limited
Partners; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the General Partner
desires by this Amendment to amend the Agreement as of the date hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, in
consideration of the mutual covenants set forth herein, and for other good and
valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged,
the General Partner hereby amends the Agreement as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Amendment to the Agreement</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The General Partner, as
general partner of the Partnership and as attorney-in-fact for its Limited
Partners, hereby amends the Agreement as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Glossary of Defined
Terms of the Agreement is amended by striking the following definition:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Ineligible
Unit&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.10 of the Allocations Exhibit</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">B.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Section&nbsp;3.10(a)&nbsp;is
amended by replacing the existing text with the following:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&nbsp;After giving effect to the special allocations set forth in
Sections 3.1 through 3.9 hereof, and the allocations of Net Income (including,
for the avoidance of doubt, Liquidating Gains that are a component of Net
Income) under Subsections 2.1(a)&nbsp;through (e)&nbsp;above, but before
allocations of Net Income are made under Section&nbsp;2.1(f)&nbsp;above, any
remaining Liquidating Gains shall first be allocated to the holders of LTIP </font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="3",CHK=342857,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KM_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 13 23:59 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Units until the Economic Capital Account Balances of such holders, to the
extent attributable to their ownership of LTIP Units, are equal to (i)&nbsp;the
Common Unit Economic Balance, multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;the number of their LTIP
Units (with respect to each holder, the &#147; Target Balance &#147;). If not all LTIP
Units are fully booked up, Liquidating Gains shall be allocated among LTIP
Units in a manner reasonably determined by the General Partner. For the
avoidance of doubt, Liquidating Gains allocated with respect to an LTIP Unit
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3.10(a)&nbsp;shall reduce (but not below zero)
the Book-Up Target for such LTIP Unit</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Continuation of the Agreement</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Agreement and this
Amendment shall be read together and shall have the same force and effect as if
the provisions of the Agreement and this Amendment were contained in one document.&nbsp;
Any provisions of the Agreement not amended by this Amendment shall remain in
full force and effect as provided in the Agreement immediately prior to the
date hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[
<i>Remainder of page&nbsp;intentionally blank</i>
]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2<a name="1608-2-KM_PB_2_174553_7056"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Rights and Duties</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.4</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Indemnity and Liability</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.94%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE VII</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">PLAN
  CHANGES AND TERMINATION</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="12%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:12.94%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE VIII</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 20.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">MISCELLANEOUS</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">

  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.1</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Limitation on Eligible
  Directors&#146; Rights</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.2</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Beneficiaries</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.3</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Benefits Not Assignable;
  Obligations Binding Upon Successors</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.4</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Governing Law;
  Severability</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">

  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">

  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.56%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compliance With Laws</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21</font></p>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.92%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.02%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.6</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.52%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Headings Not Part&nbsp;of Plan</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:5.98%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_iii_175604_3020"></a></font></p>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=883697,FOLIO='iii',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THE
MACERICH COMPANY</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ELIGIBLE
DIRECTORS&#146;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">DEFERRED
COMPENSATION/PHANTOM STOCK PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(As
Amended and Restated as of February&nbsp;4, 2010)</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE I</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TITLE, PURPOSE AND AUTHORIZED
SHARES</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This
Plan shall be known as &#147;The Macerich Company Eligible Directors&#146; Deferred
Compensation/Phantom Stock Plan.&#148;&#160; The
purpose of this Plan is to attract, motivate and retain experienced and
knowledgeable directors of The Macerich Company by permitting them to defer
compensation and affording them the opportunity to link that compensation to an
equity interest in the Company. &#160;The
total number of shares of Common Stock that may be delivered pursuant to awards
under this Plan is 500,000, subject to adjustments contemplated by Section&nbsp;5.6.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE II</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>DEFINITIONS</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Whenever
the following terms are used in this Plan they shall have the meaning specified
below unless the context clearly indicates to the contrary:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean one or more of an Eligible
Director&#146;s Cash Account(s), Stock Unit Account(s), Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account(s)&nbsp;and Dividend Equivalent Stock Account(s).&#160; Each Account includes, to the extent
applicable, any Distribution Subaccounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Additional Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> with respect to a particular calendar
year shall mean the difference (if any) between (i)&nbsp;the amount of an
Eligible Director&#146;s Compensation for such calendar year taken into account on
the Award Date, and (ii)&nbsp;the amount of Compensation the Eligible Director
would actually have been paid for such calendar year, solely to the extent that
such difference in the Eligible Director&#146;s Compensation for such calendar year
is attributable to changes in the Company&#146;s compensation policy for
non-employee directors that are approved by the Board of Directors and take
effect during or prior to such calendar year, in each case without giving
effect to any election by the Eligible Director to defer Compensation
hereunder.&#160; By way of example, a change
in an Eligible Director&#146;s Compensation for a particular calendar year as a
result of a change in the amount of the annual retainer paid by the Company to
members of a Board committee of which such Eligible Director is a member would
be treated as Additional Compensation for purposes of this Plan for that
calendar year, while a change in the Eligible Director&#146;s Compensation for a
particular calendar year as a result of such Eligible Director&#146;s becoming or
ceasing to be a member of such a Board committee would not be treated as
Additional Compensation (but could be treated as Special Compensation) for
purposes of this Plan for that calendar year.&#160;
For purposes of clarity, &#147;Additional Compensation&#148; may be a negative
number.&#160; Notwithstanding any </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_1_175655_7748"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=9328,FOLIO='1',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">other provision herein, an amount of Compensation that
is treated as Additional Compensation hereunder shall not in any event be
treated as Special Compensation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Additional Compensation Approval Date</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the date on which the Board
of Directors approves any change in the Company&#146;s compensation policy for
non-employee directors that gives rise to Additional Compensation hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Average Fair Market Value</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean (i)&nbsp;for purposes of
crediting any Stock Units hereunder pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(1), the
average of the Fair Market Values of a share of Common Stock of the Company
during the last 10 trading days preceding the Award Date, (ii)&nbsp;for
purposes of crediting any Stock Units hereunder pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(2),
the average of the Fair Market Values of a share of Common Stock of the Company
during the last 10 trading days preceding the related Additional Compensation
Approval Date, and (iii)&nbsp;for purposes of crediting any Stock Units
hereunder pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(3), the average of the Fair Market
Values of a share of Common Stock of the Company for the trading days occurring
in the calendar year preceding the March&nbsp;31 on which such Stock Units are
credited.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Award Date</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> with reference to elections under Section&nbsp;4.2
shall mean the January&nbsp;1 that next follows the date of an Eligible
Director&#146;s election made pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.2.&#160; Award Date with reference to elections under Section&nbsp;4.1shall
mean the date next following the date that the Eligible Director files his or
her election under Section&nbsp;4.1.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Board of Directors</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the Board of Directors of the
Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a Current Cash Account and/or
a Prior Cash Account.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Cash or Combination Dividends</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean cash dividends and
distributions to holders of shares of Common Stock, and dividends in connection
with which holders of shares of Common Stock have the right to elect to receive
cash, shares of Common Stock of equivalent value, or a combination thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.9</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Change in Control Event</font></u></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">with respect to the provisions of Section&nbsp;5.5A of
the Plan set forth in Appendix A, which apply to the distribution of amounts
deferred prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 and credited to Prior Cash Accounts,
Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Accounts, Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock
Accounts and Prior Stock Unit Accounts, shall have the meaning specified for
such term under The Macerich Company Amended and Restated 1994 Incentive Plan,
as amended from time to time; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">with respect to the provisions of the Plan that apply
to distributions from Current Cash Accounts, Current Dividend Equivalent Cash
Accounts, Current Dividend Equivalent Stock Accounts and Current Stock Unit
Accounts, shall mean</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_2_175705_141"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=810882,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(1)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the acquisition by any individual, entity
or group (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;13(d)(3)&nbsp;or 14(d)(2)&nbsp;of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;)) (such
individual, entity, or group, a &#147;Person&#148;) of beneficial ownership (within the
meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3 promulgated under the Exchange Act) of stock
possessing 33% or more of the combined voting power of the then-outstanding
voting securities of the Company entitled to vote generally in the election of
directors (the &#147;Outstanding Company Voting Securities&#148;); provided, however,
that, for purposes of this definition, the following acquisitions shall not
constitute a Change in Control Event; (A)&nbsp;any acquisition directly from
the Company, (B)&nbsp;any acquisition by the Company, (C)&nbsp;any acquisition
by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by the
Company or any affiliate of the Company or successor or (D)&nbsp;any
acquisition by a Person having beneficial ownership of more than 50% of the
Outstanding Company Voting Securities prior to the acquisition;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(2)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">individuals who, as of any date (the &#147;Initial
Date&#148;) after the date hereof, constitute the Board (the &#147;Incumbent Board&#148;)
cease for any reason, at any time within 12 months following the Initial Date,
to constitute at least a majority of the Board; provided, however, that any
individual becoming a director subsequent to the Initial Date whose election,
or nomination for election by the Company&#146;s stockholders, was approved by a
vote of at least a majority of the directors then comprising the Incumbent
Board (including for these purposes, the new members whose election or
nomination was so approved, without counting the member and his predecessor
twice) shall be considered as though such individual were a member of the
Incumbent Board;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(3)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">consummation of a reorganization, merger,
statutory share exchange or consolidation or similar corporate transaction
involving the Company or any of its subsidiaries, or the acquisition of assets
or stock of another entity by the Company or any of its subsidiaries (each, a &#147;Business
Combination&#148;), in each case if, following such Business Combination, any Person
(excluding any entity resulting from such Business Combination or a parent of
any such entity or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) of the Company
or such entity resulting from such Business Combination or parent of any such
entity) beneficially owns, directly or indirectly, more than 50% of,
respectively, the then-outstanding shares of stock of the entity resulting from
such Business Combination or the combined voting power of the then-outstanding
voting securities of such entity, except to the extent that the ownership in
excess of 50% existed prior to the Business Combination; or</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(4)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">consummation of a sale or other
disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company (an &#147;Asset
Transfer&#148;), other than a transfer to (A)&nbsp;one or more of the beneficial
owners (immediately before the Asset Transfer) of the then-outstanding shares
of stock of the Company (&#147;Outstanding Company Stock&#148;) in exchange for or with
respect to such Outstanding Company Stock of such beneficial owners, or (B)&nbsp;an
entity, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of which is owned,
directly or indirectly, </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_3_175711_7608"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=272727,FOLIO='3',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">by the Company, or
(C)&nbsp;a Person that owns, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total
value or voting power of the Outstanding Company Stock, or (D)&nbsp;an entity,
50% or more of the total value or voting power of which is owned, directly or
indirectly, by a Person described in the preceding clause (C).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each event comprising a
Change in Control Event under this Subsection&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;is intended to
constitute a &#147;change in ownership or effective control&#148; or a &#147;change in the
ownership of a substantial portion of the assets&#148; of the Company as such terms
are defined for purposes of Section&nbsp;409A of the Internal Revenue Code and
such definition of &#147;Change in Control Event&#148; as used herein shall be
interpreted consistently therewith.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.10</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Code</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of
1986, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.11</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Common Stock</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the Common Stock of the
Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.12</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Committee</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a Committee of the Board of
Directors acting in accordance with Article&nbsp;VI and applicable Maryland
law, or the Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.13</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Company</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean The Macerich Company, a
Maryland corporation, and its successors and assigns.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.14</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the annual retainer and
regular meeting fees payable by the Company to an Eligible Director for a
calendar year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.15</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a bookkeeping account
maintained by the Company on behalf of each Eligible Director who elects to
defer Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004
in cash in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.1.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.16</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall
mean a bookkeeping account maintained by the Company on behalf of an Eligible Director
that is credited with Dividend Equivalents in the form of cash deferrals
attributable to Stock Units credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock
Unit Account (with respect to Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned
after December&nbsp;31, 2004) in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.3(b)(1).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.17</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Dividend Equivalent Stock
Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall
mean a bookkeeping account maintained by the Company on behalf of an Eligible
Director that is credited with Dividend Equivalents in the form of Stock Units
attributable to Stock Units credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock
Unit Account (with respect to Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned
after December&nbsp;31, 2004) in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.3(c)(1).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.18</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Stock Unit Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a bookkeeping account
maintained by the Company on behalf of each Eligible Director who elects to
defer </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_4_175756_8146"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=256609,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31,
2004 in Stock Units in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.2.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.19</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Disability</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a medically determinable
physical or mental impairment that can be expected to result in death or can be
expected to last for a continuous period of not less than 12 months that
renders an Eligible Director unable to engage in any substantial gainful
activity.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.20</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Discount Rate</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean an interest rate equal to 5%
per annum.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.21</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Disinterested Director</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a member of the Board of
Directors who is not generally disqualified from making decisions concerning
this Plan or all actions hereunder under any applicable legal requirements, but
in no event shall a member of the Board of Directors participate in any
decision affecting only his or her benefits under this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.22</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Distribution Subaccount</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a subaccount of an Eligible
Director&#146;s Account established to separately account for deferred Compensation
and Special Meeting Fees (and Dividend Equivalents or other earnings or losses
thereon) that are subject to different distribution elections.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.23</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalent</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the amount of Cash or
Combination Dividends paid by the Company after January&nbsp;31, 1995 on that
number of shares of Common Stock equivalent to the number of Stock Units then
credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account, or Stock Unit Accounts,
as applicable, and Dividend Equivalent Stock Account, or Dividend Equivalent
Stock Accounts, as applicable, which amount shall be allocated as additional
Stock Units to the Eligible Director&#146;s Dividend Equivalent Stock Account(s)&nbsp;or
as additional deferrals to the Eligible Director&#146;s Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account(s), as provided in Section&nbsp;5.3.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.24</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalent Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a Current Dividend Equivalent
Cash Account and/or a Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Account.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.25</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalent Stock Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a Current Dividend Equivalent
Stock Account and/or a Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock Account.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.26</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Effective Date</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean July&nbsp;29, 1994.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.27</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Eligible Director</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a member of the Board of
Directors of the Company who is compensated in such capacity and (as to any
outstanding Account balances under this Plan) any such person who has Account
balances under the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.28</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exchange Act</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the Securities Exchange Act
of 1934, as amended from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.29</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Fair Market Value</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean on any date the closing price
of the stock on the Composite Tape, as published in the Western Edition of The
Wall Street Journal, of the principal securities exchange or market on which
the stock is so listed, </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_5_175817_7091"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=249298,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">admitted to trade, or quoted on such date, or, if
there is no trading of the stock on such date, then the closing price of the
stock as quoted on such Composite Tape on the next preceding date on which
there was trading in such shares; provided, however, if the stock is not so
listed, admitted or quoted, the Committee may designate such other exchange,
market or source of data as it deems appropriate for determining such value for
purposes of this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.30</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Interest Rate</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the rate that is 120% of the
federal long-term rate for compounding on a quarterly basis, determined and
