published by the Secretary of the United States Department of Treasury under Section&nbsp;1274(d)&nbsp;of
the Code, for the month in which interest is credited.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.31</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Plan</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean The Macerich Company Eligible
Directors&#146; Deferred Compensation/Phantom Stock Plan, as amended from time to
time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.32</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Plan Year</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the applicable calendar year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.33</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a bookkeeping account
maintained by the Company on behalf of each Eligible Director who elects to
defer Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned before January&nbsp;1, 2005
in cash in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.1.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.34</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">  </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">shall
mean a bookkeeping account maintained by the Company on behalf of an Eligible
Director that is credited with Dividend Equivalents in the form of cash
deferrals attributable to Stock Units credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior
Stock Unit Account (with respect to Compensation and Special Meeting Fees
earned before January&nbsp;1, 2005) in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.3(b)(2).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.35</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock
Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">shall mean a bookkeeping account
maintained by the Company on behalf of an Eligible Director that is credited
with Dividend Equivalents in the form of Stock Units attributable to Stock
Units credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Stock Unit Account (with
respect to Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned before January&nbsp;1,
2005) in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.3(c)(2).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.36</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Stock Unit Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a bookkeeping account
maintained by the Company on behalf of each Eligible Director who elects to
defer Compensation and Special Meeting Fees earned before January&nbsp;1, 2005
in Stock Units in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.2.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.37</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Special Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> with respect to a particular calendar
year shall mean the difference (if any) obtained by subtracting (i)&nbsp;the
sum of (a)&nbsp;the amount of an Eligible Director&#146;s Compensation for such
calendar year taken into account on the Award Date, and (b)&nbsp;the amount of
the Eligible Director&#146;s Additional Compensation (if any) taken into account for
such calendar year at any time after the Award Date, from (ii)&nbsp;the amount
of Compensation the Eligible Director would actually have been paid for such
calendar year (including, without limitation, any such difference attributable
to increases </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_6_175837_455"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=636462,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">or decreases in annual retainer levels and regular meeting
fees, any Special Meeting Fees, and any other Compensation not taken into
account on the Award Date or as Additional Compensation after the Award Date),
in each case without giving effect to any election by the Eligible Director to
defer Compensation hereunder.&#160; For
purposes of clarity, &#147;Special Compensation&#148; may be a negative number.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.38</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Special Meeting Fees</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean the meeting fees that are
paid by the Company after January&nbsp;31, 1995 to an Eligible Director for
meetings during a deferral period in addition to the regular meetings
contemplated at the time of a deferral election for that deferral period.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.39</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Stock Unit or Unit</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a non-voting unit of
measurement that is deemed for bookkeeping purposes to be equivalent to one
outstanding share of Common Stock of the Company solely for purposes of this
Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.40</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Stock Unit Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a Current Stock Unit Account
and/or a Prior Stock Unit Account.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2.41</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Unforeseeable Emergency</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall mean a severe financial hardship
to the Eligible Director resulting from an illness or accident of the Eligible
Director, the Eligible Director&#146;s spouse or a dependent (as defined in Section&nbsp;152(a)&nbsp;of
the Code) of the Eligible Director, loss to the Eligible Director&#146;s property
due to casualty, or other similar extraordinary and unforeseeable circumstances
arising as a result of events beyond the control of the Eligible Director.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE III</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>PARTICIPATION</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each
Eligible Director shall become a participant in the Plan by electing to defer
his or her Compensation or Special Meeting Fees in accordance with Article&nbsp;IV.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE IV</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>DEFERRAL ELECTIONS</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Initial Elections</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On or before the 30</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;day after first becoming an Eligible Director,
a new Eligible Director may make an irrevocable election to defer all or a
portion (in 10% increments) of his or her Compensation and/or Special Meeting
Fees payable for services to be rendered by the Eligible Director after the
date such election is filed with the Committee and during the remainder of the
calendar year during which the Eligible Director first becomes an Eligible
Director and/or during the next one or two calendar years in (a)&nbsp;cash, in
accordance with Section&nbsp;5.1, or (b)&nbsp;Stock Units, in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.2.&#160; Such election shall be in writing on a form
provided by the Company and approved by the Committee and must be filed no
later than the 30</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;day following the date that the Eligible
Director first becomes an Eligible Director.&#160;
Such election may also specify that the amounts deferred pursuant to
such election shall be paid under one of the optional forms of benefits set
forth in Section&nbsp;5.5(a).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7<a name="1608-2-KQ-01_PB_7_175850_4141"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=365965,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-01_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:00 2010' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Subsequent Annual Elections</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">General Rule</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; On or before
the date set forth in the applicable election agreement (but in no event later
than December&nbsp;31 of the year preceding the first year to which the
election applies), each Eligible Director may make an irrevocable election to
defer all or a portion (in 10% increments) of his or her Compensation and/or
Special Meeting Fees payable for services to be rendered by the Eligible
Director during the next one, two, or three calendar years in (a)&nbsp;cash, in
accordance with Section&nbsp;5.1, or (b)&nbsp;Stock Units, in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.2.&#160; Such election shall be in writing on forms
provided by the Company and approved by the Committee.&#160; Such election may also specify that the
amounts deferred pursuant to such election shall be paid under one of the
optional time and forms of distribution set forth in Section&nbsp;5.5(a).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Special Rule&nbsp;for 2005
and 2006 Deferrals</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Any Eligible Director who filed a deferral
election under this Plan prior to December&nbsp;31, 2003 with respect to
Compensation and/or Special Meeting Fees to be earned in 2005 and/or 2006 (a &#147;Pre-Existing
Deferral Election&#148;) may file a new distribution election with respect to
amounts to be deferred in 2005 and/or 2006 pursuant to such Pre-Existing Deferral
Election (the &#147;2005-2006 Deferrals&#148;) no later than December&nbsp;31, 2005.&#160; If the Eligible Director does not file such a
distribution election for such 2005-2006 Deferrals, then he or she shall be
deemed to have elected to receive a distribution of his 2005-2006 Deferrals as
provided in the Eligible Director&#146;s most recent effective distribution election
filed prior to December&nbsp;31, 2004 with the Committee in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.5A(b)&nbsp;with
respect to all amounts deferred under such Pre-Existing Deferral Election.&#160; Any further changes to the time and manner of
distribution of the Participant&#146;s 2005-2006 Deferrals shall be made in
accordance with, and governed by, the provisions of Section&nbsp;5.5(b)&nbsp;and
not Section&nbsp;5.5A(b).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2008 Distribution
Elections</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">. &#160;Notwithstanding the provisions of Sections
4.1, 4.2(a), 4.2(b)&nbsp;and 5.5 hereof, a Participant may elect to change his
or her distribution election with respect to his or her Current Cash Accounts,
Current Dividend Equivalent Cash Accounts, Current Dividend Equivalent Stock
Accounts and Current Stock Unit Accounts from among the optional times and
forms of distribution set forth in Section&nbsp;5.5(a)&nbsp;by filing a new
election with the Committee on or after January&nbsp;1, 2008 and on or before December&nbsp;31,
2008.&#160; Any such election change shall
apply only to amounts that would not otherwise be payable in 2008 and shall not
cause any amount to be paid in 2008 that would not otherwise be payable in
2008.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE V</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>DEFERRAL ACCOUNTS</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, if an Eligible Director has elected or
elects in accordance with Article&nbsp;IV to defer Compensation and/or Special
Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 in cash, the Committee shall
establish and maintain a Cash Account for the Eligible Director under the Plan,
which </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_8_190247_5335"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=278602,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Account shall be a memorandum account on the books of
the Company and shall be such Eligible Director&#146;s &#147;Current Cash Account.&#148;&#160; An Eligible Director&#146;s Current Cash Account
shall be credited as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(1)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of the last day of each calendar
quarter, the Committee shall credit the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Cash
Account with an amount equal to the elected percentage of the Compensation
deferred by the Eligible Director during such quarter;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(2)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of the date payment of any Special
Meeting Fees would otherwise be made, the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Cash
Account shall be credited with an amount equal to the elected percentage of the
Eligible Director&#146;s Special Meeting Fees; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(3)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of the last day of each calendar
quarter, the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Cash Account shall be credited with
earnings equal to an amount determined by multiplying the balance credited to
such Account as of the last day of the preceding quarter by one-fourth of the
Interest Rate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, the Cash Account (if any) established
for an Eligible Director prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 shall be that Eligible
Director&#146;s &#147;Prior Cash Account,&#148; and no amount of Compensation or Special
Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 that such Eligible Director
elects to defer under this Plan shall be credited to such Prior Cash
Account.&#160; As of the last day of each
calendar quarter, the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Cash Account shall be credited
with earnings equal to an amount determined by multiplying the balance credited
to such Account as of the last day of the preceding quarter by one-fourth of
the Interest Rate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Stock Unit Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Stock Unit Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, if an Eligible Director has elected or
elects in accordance with Article&nbsp;IV to defer his or her Compensation
and/or Special Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 in Stock Units,
the Committee shall establish and maintain a Stock Unit Account for the
Eligible Director under the Plan, which Account shall be a memorandum account
on the books of the Company and shall be such Eligible Director&#146;s &#147;Current
Stock Unit Account.&#148;&#160; An Eligible
Director&#146;s Current Stock Account shall be credited as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(1)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Regular Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
If an Eligible Director has elected or elects to defer his or her
Compensation earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 in Stock Units, the Committee
shall credit on the Award Date to the Current Stock Unit Account of the
Eligible Director a number of Units determined by dividing the present value of
the Compensation deferred by the Eligible Director by the Average Fair Market
Value of a share of Common Stock.&#160; The
present value shall be computed assuming the Compensation deferred would have
been paid on the first day of the calendar year to which it relates (or, in the
case of Compensation deferred under an election under Section&nbsp;4.1 for the
remainder of the calendar </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_9_190328_5796"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=162517,FOLIO='9',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">year in which the
Eligible Director first becomes an Eligible Director,&#160; on the Award Date) at the prevailing rate of
Compensation at the time of the election made in accordance with Article&nbsp;IV,
discounted to present value using the Discount Rate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(2)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Additional Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
If an Eligible Director has elected or elects to defer his or her
Compensation and/or Special Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 in
Stock Units and such Eligible Director has any Additional Compensation for a
particular calendar year to which such deferral election applies, the Committee
shall, on the first day of the month following the month in which the related
Additional Compensation Approval Date occurs: (i)&nbsp;in the event such
Additional Compensation is a positive number, credit the Eligible Director&#146;s
Current Stock Unit Account with a number of Units determined by dividing the
portion of the Eligible Director&#146;s Additional Compensation that is deferred by
the Eligible Director under this Plan for that calendar year and any future
calendar year subject to such deferral election by the Average Fair Market
Value of a share of Common Stock, or (ii)&nbsp;in the event such Additional
Compensation is a negative number, debit the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock
Unit Account a number of Units determined by dividing the portion of the
Eligible Director&#146;s Additional Compensation for that calendar year and any
future calendar year subject to such deferral election by the Average Fair
Market Value of a share of Common Stock.&#160;
In no event, however, shall the Company make any reduction, during or
after a particular year, in the level of Compensation and/or Special Meeting
Fees for any Eligible Director for that particular year to the extent such
reduction would result in the Eligible Director receiving any amount that would
be treated as a &#147;substitute for a payment of deferred compensation&#148; within the
meaning of Treas. Reg. Section&nbsp;1.409A-3(f), or that would otherwise
violate Section&nbsp;409A of the Code, and would result in any tax, penalty or
interest under Section&nbsp;409A of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(3)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Special Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
If an Eligible Director has elected or elects to defer his or her
Compensation and/or Special Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 in
Stock Units, the Committee shall, on the March&nbsp;31</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">st</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;following the
year in which there is any Special Compensation with respect to such Eligible
Director: (i)&nbsp;in the event such Special Compensation is a positive number,
credit the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit Account with a number of
Units determined by dividing the portion of the Eligible Director&#146;s Special
Compensation that is deferred by the Eligible Director under this Plan for that
year by the Average Fair Market Value of a share of Common Stock, or (ii)&nbsp;in
the event such Special Compensation is a negative number, debit the Eligible
Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit Account a number of Units determined by dividing
the portion of the Eligible Director&#146;s Special Compensation subject to such
deferral election by the Average Fair Market Value of a share of Common
Stock.&#160; In no event, however, shall the
Company make any reduction, during or after a particular year, in the level of
Compensation and/or Special Meeting Fees for any Eligible Director for that
particular year to the extent such reduction would result in the Eligible
Director receiving any amount that would be treated as a </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_10_190350_2897"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=14,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=351624,FOLIO='10',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;substitute for a
payment of deferred compensation&#148; within the meaning of Treas. Reg. Section&nbsp;1.409A-3(f),
or that would otherwise violate Section&nbsp;409A of the Code, and would result
in any tax, penalty or interest under Section&nbsp;409A of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(4)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Payment of Additional
and Special Compensation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Notwithstanding any other provision herein, any Stock Units credited to
an Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit Account pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(2)&nbsp;or
Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(3)&nbsp;shall be subject to the same payment rules&nbsp;as
apply to the Eligible Director&#146;s existing deferral elections of Compensation
and/or Special Meeting Fees for the applicable calendar year.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Stock Unit Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, the Stock Units Account (if any)
established for an Eligible Director prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 shall be
that Eligible Director&#146;s &#147;Prior Stock Unit Account,&#148; and no amount of
Compensation or Special Meeting Fees earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 that
such Eligible Director elects to defer under this Plan shall be credited to
such Prior Stock Unit Account.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Transfers of Stock Units
Attributable to 2005 and 2006 Deferrals</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Effective January&nbsp;1,
2005, any Units credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Stock Unit Account
prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 that are attributable to Compensation to be
earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 shall be transferred to such Eligible
Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit Account established pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Limitations on Rights Associated with
Units</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; An Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit
Account and/or Prior Stock Unit Account shall each be a memorandum account on the
books of the Company.&#160; The Units credited
to an Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account(s)&nbsp;shall be used solely as a
device for the determination of the number of shares of Common Stock to be
eventually distributed to such Eligible Director in accordance with this
Plan.&#160; The Units shall not be treated as
property or as a trust fund of any kind.&#160;
All shares of Common Stock or other amounts attributed to the Units
shall be and remain the sole property of the Company, and each Eligible
Director&#146;s right in the Units is limited to the right to receive shares of
Common Stock in the future as herein provided.&#160;
No Eligible Director shall be entitled to any voting or other
shareholder rights with respect to Units granted under this Plan.&#160; The number of Units credited under this Section&nbsp;shall
be subject to adjustment in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.6.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Credited Units Not Vested</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
The Units credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account(s)&nbsp;shall
only become vested in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.4(a).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalents; Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account; Dividend Equivalent Stock Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Allocation of Dividend Equivalents</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Each Eligible Director shall, at the time of making an election in
accordance with Article&nbsp;IV, elect to have all Dividend Equivalents
attributable to Units credited to his or her Stock Unit Account </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_11_190408_3020"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=15,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=221089,FOLIO='11',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">pursuant to such election credited to either (1)&nbsp;a
Dividend Equivalent Cash Account for such Eligible Director in accordance with
subsection (b)&nbsp;below or (2)&nbsp;a Dividend Equivalent Stock Account for
such Eligible Director in accordance with subsection (c)&nbsp;below.&#160; Such election shall be irrevocable and shall
remain in effect with respect to all Stock Units credited to the Eligible
Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account and Dividend Equivalent Stock Account in
accordance with the Eligible Director&#146;s election made pursuant to Article&nbsp;IV.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(1)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Dividend
Equivalent Cash Account</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, if an
Eligible Director has elected or elects to have Dividend Equivalents with
respect to Compensation and/or Special Meeting Fees deferred in Stock Units
after December&nbsp;31, 2004 credited to his or her Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account, the Committee shall establish and maintain a Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account for the Eligible Director under the Plan, which Account shall be a
memorandum account on the books of the Company and shall be such Eligible
Director&#146;s &#147;Current Dividend Equivalent Cash Account.&#148;&#160; In such case, the Committee shall, as of each
dividend payment date, credit the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Dividend
Equivalent Cash Account with an amount equal to the amount of Dividend
Equivalents attributable to Stock Units then credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s
Current Stock Unit Account.&#160; In addition,
as of the last day of each calendar quarter, the Eligible Director&#146;s Current
Dividend Equivalent Cash Account shall be credited with earnings in an amount
equal to that determined by multiplying the balance credited to such account as
of the last day of the preceding quarter by an amount equal to one-fourth of
the Interest Rate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(2)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Dividend Equivalent
Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, the Dividend
Equivalent Cash Account (if any) established for an Eligible Director prior to January&nbsp;1,
2005 shall be that Eligible Director&#146;s &#147;Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Account.&#148;&#160; The Committee shall, as of each dividend
payment date, credit the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account with an amount equal to the amount of Dividend Equivalents attributable
to Stock Units then credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Stock Unit
Account.&#160; In addition, as of the last day
of each calendar quarter, the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Dividend Equivalent
Cash Account shall be credited with earnings in an amount equal to that
determined by multiplying the balance credited to such account as of the last
day of the preceding quarter by an amount equal to one-fourth of the Interest
Rate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(3)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Transfer of Dividend
Equivalents Attributable to 2005 and 2006 Deferrals</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.&#160;
</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective January&nbsp;1,
2005, any Dividend Equivalents that were credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s
Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Account prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 that were
attributable to Stock Units credited to his or her Stock Unit Account with
respect to Compensation to be earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 shall be
transferred to such Eligible Director&#146;s Current Dividend Equivalent Cash
Account established pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.3(b)(1).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_12_190428_7748"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=16,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=19185,FOLIO='12',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalent Stock
Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(1)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Current Dividend
Equivalent Stock Account</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective January&nbsp;1, 2005, if an
Eligible Director has elected or elects to have Dividend Equivalents credited
to his or her Dividend Equivalent Stock Account, the Committee shall establish
and maintain a Dividend Equivalent Stock Account for the Eligible Director
under the Plan, which Account shall be a memorandum account on the books of the
Company and shall be such Eligible Director&#146;s &#147;Current Dividend Equivalent
Stock Account.&#148;&#160; In such case, the
Committee shall, as of each dividend payment date, credit the Eligible Director&#146;s
Current Dividend Equivalent Stock Account with an amount of Units determined by
dividing the amount of Dividend Equivalents attributable to Stock Units then
credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit Account by the Fair
Market Value of a share of Common Stock as of such date.&#160; The Units credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s
Current Dividend Equivalent Stock Account shall be subject to adjustment under Section&nbsp;5.6.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(2)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Prior Dividend Equivalent
Stock Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.<b>&#160; </b>Effective January&nbsp;1,
2005, the Dividend Equivalent Stock Account (if any) established for an
Eligible Director prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 shall be that Eligible Director&#146;s
&#147;Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock Account.&#148;&#160;
The Committee shall, as of each dividend payment date, credit the
Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock Account with an amount of
Units determined by dividing the amount of Dividend Equivalents attributable to
Stock Units then credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Prior Stock Unit Account
by the Fair Market Value of a share of Common Stock on such date.&#160; The Units credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s
Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock Account shall be subject to adjustment under Section&nbsp;5.6.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(3)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Transfer of Dividend
Equivalents Attributable to 2005 and 2006 Deferrals</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.&#160;
</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Effective January&nbsp;1,
2005, any Dividend Equivalents that were credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s
Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock Account prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 that were
attributable to Stock Units credited to his or her Stock Unit Account with
respect to Compensation to be earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004 shall be
transferred to such Eligible Director&#146;s Current Dividend Equivalent Stock
Account established pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.3(c)(1).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Credited Dividends Account Not Vested</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Amounts credited to the Dividend Equivalent Cash Account or the Dividend
Equivalent Stock Account shall only become vested in accordance with Sections
5.4(a)&nbsp;or (c), as the case may be.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Vesting</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Stock Unit Account; Dividend
Equivalent Stock Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; The rights of
each Eligible Director in respect of his or her Stock Unit Account and Dividend
Equivalent Stock Account shall vest as the Eligible Director&#146;s services (to
which the deferred Compensation and deferred Special Meeting Fees relate) are
rendered.&#160; </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_13_190449_141"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=17,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=577887,FOLIO='13',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Accordingly, effective as of the date the Eligible
Director ceases to be a member of the Board of Directors, the number of Units
credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account and Dividend Equivalent
Stock Account shall be reduced to the number of Units that would have been in
such accounts on the date the Eligible Director ceased to serve on the Board of
Directors had the Compensation and Special Meeting Fees the Eligible Director
elected to defer included only Compensation and Special Meeting Fees payable
for the period of actual service as a director, less any vested Units
previously distributed as shares of Common Stock pursuant to the Eligible
Director&#146;s election to receive installment payments and/or a distribution under
Section&nbsp;5.5(d)&nbsp;or 5.5A(d)&nbsp;or (e).&#160; For purposes of calculating the number of
Units that would have been credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit
Account and Dividend Equivalent Stock Account, the Eligible Director&#146;s annual
retainer shall be prorated for the year of cessation on a monthly basis.&#160; Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, if an
Eligible Director ceases to be a member of the Board of Directors by reason of
death or Disability, or upon or following a Change in Control Event, the
Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account and Dividend Equivalent Stock Account
shall immediately become fully vested.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
The rights of each Eligible Director in respect of his or her Cash
Account shall at all times be fully vested.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Dividend Equivalent Cash Account</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
The rights of each Eligible Director in respect of his or her Dividend
Equivalent Cash Account shall vest as the Eligible Director&#146;s services (to
which the deferred Compensation and deferred Special Meeting Fees relate) are
rendered.&#160; Accordingly, effective as of
the date the Eligible Director ceases to be a member of the Board of Directors,
the Company shall reduce any amount credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s
Dividend Equivalent Cash Account by an amount equal to any Dividend Equivalents
(together with any related earnings) attributable to any Units which are
forfeited in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.4(a)&nbsp;and/or previously
distributed as shares of Common Stock in accordance with the Eligible Director&#146;s
election to receive installment payments and/or a distribution under Section&nbsp;5.5(d)&nbsp;or
5.5A(d)&nbsp;or (e).&#160; Notwithstanding the
preceding, if an Eligible Director ceases to be a member of the Board of
Directors by reason of death or Disability, or upon or following a Change in
Control Event, the Eligible Director&#146;s Dividend Equivalent Cash Account shall
immediately become fully vested.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Distribution of Benefits</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.&#160;
</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
provisions of this Section&nbsp;5.5 shall apply only with respect to
distributions from Current Cash Accounts, Current Dividend Equivalent Cash
Accounts, Current Dividend Equivalent Stock Accounts and Current Stock Unit Accounts.&#160; The provisions of Section&nbsp;5.5A as set
forth in Appendix A to this Plan document govern the distribution from Prior
Cash Accounts, Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Accounts, Prior Dividend
Equivalent Stock Accounts and Prior Stock Unit Accounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Time and Manner of
Distribution</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The vested amounts credited an Eligible
Director&#146;s Accounts shall be distributed to the Eligible Director (or, in the
event of his or her </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_14_190511_7608"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=18,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=836299,FOLIO='14',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">death, the
Eligible Director&#146;s Beneficiary) upon his or her termination from service on
the Board of Directors; provided, however, that a termination of service shall
not be deemed to have occurred for any purpose under the Plan unless such
termination from service constitutes a &#147;separation from service&#148; as defined
under Section&nbsp;409A of the Code and any regulations promulgated
thereunder.&#160; Notwithstanding the
foregoing, on the annual or multiple-year deferral election form that a
Participant files in accordance with the provisions of Article&nbsp;IV of the
Plan for any Plan Year or series of two or three Plan Years beginning on or
after January&nbsp;1, 2005, an Eligible Director may elect to have the amounts
credited to his or her Accounts with respect to such annual or multiple-year
deferral period distributed to him or her on any one of the following optional
distribution dates:&#160; (A)&nbsp;January&nbsp;1
following the Eligible Director&#146;s termination of service, (B)&nbsp;January&nbsp;1
of a specified year designated by the Eligible Director, which shall be no earlier
than 3 years after the Plan Year to which the deferral relates, or (C)&nbsp;the
earlier to occur of (A)&nbsp;or (B).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The benefits payable under this Plan
shall be distributed to the Eligible Director (or, in the event of his or her
death, the Eligible Director&#146;s Beneficiary) in a lump sum or, if elected by the
Eligible Director in writing on the annual or multiple-year deferral election
form that a Participant files in accordance with the provisions of Article&nbsp;IV
of the Plan for a Plan Year beginning on or after January&nbsp;1, 2005, in
annual installments for up to 10 years.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">An
Eligible Director shall be permitted to make a different election with respect
to each annual or multiple-year deferral period as to the time and manner in
which his or her benefits shall be distributed.&#160;
For each Eligible Director who makes one or more distribution elections
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5(a), each of his or her Accounts shall be
divided into two or more Distribution Subaccounts as necessary to separately
account for deferrals that are payable at different times and/or in different
manners.&#160; For purposes of calculating
installments, the Eligible Director&#146;s vested Accounts (and Distribution
Subaccounts if applicable) will be valued as of December&nbsp;31 of each year,
and divided by the number of remaining installments to determine the amount of
the installment to be paid in the following year.&#160; Subsequent installments will be adjusted
accordingly for the next calendar year, according to procedures established by
the Committee.&#160; Such installment payments
shall commence as of the date benefits become distributable under this Section&nbsp;5.5(a).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding any other provision of
this Section&nbsp;5.5, in the event that an Eligible Director becomes entitled
to a credit of Stock Units pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(2)&nbsp;and such
Stock Units would otherwise have been payable pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5
prior to the date such Units are credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Current
Stock Unit Account, such Units shall be paid not later than thirty (30) days
following the date such Units are credited pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2(a)(2).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_15_190522_8146"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=19,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=205449,FOLIO='15',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Change in Time or Manner
of Distribution</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Notwithstanding subsection (a), an Eligible
Director may elect to further defer the commencement of any distribution to be
made, or change the manner of any distribution election from a lump sum to
annual installments made, with respect to benefits payable under this Plan by
filing a new written election with the Committee on a form approved by the
Committee; provided, however, that (A)&nbsp;no such election shall be effective
until one year after the date on which the election is made, (B)&nbsp;the first
payment with respect to which such election is made must be deferred for a
period of not less than five years from the date such payment would otherwise
have been made or payments would have commenced, and (C)&nbsp;any election
related to a payment that commences on any date other than the date of the
Eligible Director&#146;s termination of service shall only be effective if it is
made at least twelve months prior to the date of the first scheduled payment
under such election.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Effect of Change in
Control Event</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Notwithstanding subsections (a)&nbsp;and (b),
if a Change in Control Event and a termination of service occurs, the vested
portions of an Eligible Director&#146;s Accounts shall be distributed immediately in
a lump sum.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Distribution for
Unforeseeable Emergencies</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; An Eligible
Director (which for purposes of this Section&nbsp;5.5(d)&nbsp;includes former
Eligible Directors) may request a distribution for an Unforeseeable Emergency
without penalty of an amount not greater than the value of the Eligible
Director&#146;s vested benefit under this Plan.&#160;
Such distribution for an Unforeseeable Emergency shall be subject to
approval by the Committee in its sole discretion and may be made only to the
extent necessary to satisfy such Unforeseeable Emergency plus amounts necessary
to pay taxes reasonably anticipated as a result of the distribution, after taking
into account the extent to which such hardship is or may be relieved (1)&nbsp;through
reimbursement or compensation by insurance or otherwise or (2)&nbsp;by
liquidation of the Eligible Director&#146;s assets, to the extent the liquidation of
such assets would not itself cause severe financial hardship.&#160; Amounts distributed pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5(d)&nbsp;shall
be distributed only from vested amounts credited to his or her Accounts and
shall be distributed first from an Eligible Director&#146;s Cash and Dividend
Equivalent Cash Accounts, and, to the extent the balance of the Participant&#146;s
Cash and Dividend Equivalent Cash Accounts is not sufficient to satisfy the
severe financial hardship, next as a distribution of shares of the Company&#146;s
Common Stock with a Fair Market Value equal to such deficiency from the vested
portion of such Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit and Dividend Equivalent Stock
Accounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Form&nbsp;of Distribution</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Stock Units credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account and
Dividend Equivalent Stock Account shall be distributed in an equivalent whole
number of shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock.&#160;
Fractions shall be disregarded.&#160;
Amounts credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Cash Account and vested in
the Eligible Director&#146;s Dividend Equivalent Cash Account shall be distributed
in cash.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(f)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Small Benefit Exception</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Notwithstanding any other provision of this Plan to the contrary, if at
the time any partial or installment distribution is to be made to an Eligible
Director hereunder the total vested balance remaining in the Eligible </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_16_190540_7091"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
