<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=20,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=943769,FOLIO='16',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Director&#146;s Current Cash Account and Current Dividend
Equivalent Cash Account is less than $2,000 and the number of vested Units
credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s Current Stock Unit Account of Current
Dividend Equivalent Stock Account is less than 100, then all such remaining
vested balances and vested Units shall be distributed in a lump sum on the date
scheduled for such partial or installment distribution.&#160; This provision is intended to comply with
Treasury Regulations Section&nbsp;1.409A-2(b)(2)(iii)&nbsp;and shall be
interpreted accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(g)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Distributions to Specified
Employees</font></u></b><b><i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">.&#160; </font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding any other provision of
this Plan to the contrary, and solely to the extent that a delay in payment is
required in order to avoid the imposition of any tax under Section&nbsp;409A of
the Code, if an Eligible Director is a &#147;specified employee&#148; for purposes of Section&nbsp;409A(a)(2)(B)&nbsp;of
the Code, and any amounts to be distributed under this Agreement are considered
to be non-qualified deferred compensation payable in connection with the
Eligible Director&#146;s separation from service with the Company for purposes of Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code, which otherwise would be payable at any time during the six-month
period immediately following such separation from service, then such amounts
shall not be paid prior to, and shall instead be payable in a lump sum within
ten (10)&nbsp;business days following, the expiration of such six-month period.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Adjustments in Case of Changes in
Common Stock</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; If any stock dividend, stock split,
recapitalization, merger, consolidation, combination or exchange of shares,
sale of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company, split-up,
split-off, spin-off, liquidation or similar change in capitalization or any
similar extraordinary dividend distribution to holders of the Company&#146;s Common
Stock (other than Cash or Combination Dividends) shall occur, proportionate and
equitable adjustments shall be made in the number and type of shares of Common
Stock or other property reserved and of Units (both credited and vested) under
this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Company&#146;s Right to Withhold</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
The Company shall satisfy any state or federal income tax withholding
obligation arising upon distribution of an Eligible Director&#146;s accounts by
reducing the number of shares of Common Stock otherwise deliverable to the
Eligible Director by the appropriate number of shares, valued at the average of
the Fair Market Values of a share of Common Stock during the last 10 trading
days preceding the date of distribution, required to satisfy such tax
withholding obligation.&#160; If the Company,
for any reason, cannot satisfy the withholding obligation in accordance with
the preceding sentence, the Eligible Director shall pay or provide for payment
in cash of the amount of any taxes which the Company may be required to
withhold with respect to the benefits hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Stockholder Approval</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
This Plan, and all the elections, actions and accruals with respect to
Stock Units and Dividend Equivalents made prior to stockholder approval, was
originally approved by the stockholders of the Company at their 1995 annual
meeting.&#160; Amendments to the Plan have
been approved by the Board of Directors pursuant to Article&nbsp;VII.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17<a name="1608-2-KQ-03_PB_17_190556_455"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=21,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=511170,FOLIO='17',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-03_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:02 2010' -->



<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE VI</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>ADMINISTRATION</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">6.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">The Administrator</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
The Committee hereunder shall consist of two (2)&nbsp;or more
Disinterested Directors appointed from time to time by the Board of Directors
to serve as the administrator of this Plan at its pleasure.&#160; Any member of the Committee may resign by
delivering a written resignation to the Board of Directors.&#160; Members of the Committee shall not receive
any additional compensation for administration of this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">6.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Committee Action</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
The Committee may, for the purpose of administering this Plan, choose a
Secretary who may be, but is not required to be, a member of the Committee, who
shall keep minutes of the Committee&#146;s proceedings and all records and documents
pertaining to the Committee&#146;s administration of this Plan.&#160; A member of the Committee shall not vote or
act upon any matter which relates solely to himself or herself as a Participant
in this Plan.&#160; The Secretary may execute
any certificate or other written direction on behalf of the Committee.&#160; Action of the Committee with respect to the
administration of this Plan shall be taken pursuant to a majority vote or by
unanimous written consent of its members.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">6.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Rights and Duties</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Subject to the limitations of this Plan, the Committee shall be charged
with the general administration of this Plan and the responsibility for
carrying out its provisions, and shall have powers necessary to accomplish
those purposes, including, but not by way of limitation, the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To construe, interpret and administer this Plan;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To resolve any questions concerning the amount of
benefits payable to an Eligible Director (except that no member of the
Committee shall participate in a decision relating solely to his or her own
benefits);</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To make all other determinations required by this
Plan;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To maintain all the necessary records for the
administration of this Plan; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To make and publish forms, rules&nbsp;and procedures
for elections under and for the administration of this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
determination of the Committee made in good faith as to any disputed question
or controversy and the Committee&#146;s determination of benefits payable to
Eligible Directors shall be conclusive.&#160;
In performing its duties, the Committee shall be entitled to rely on
information, opinions, reports or statements prepared or presented by:&#160; (1)&nbsp;officers or employees of the Company
whom the Committee believes to be reliable and competent as to such matters;
and (2)&nbsp;counsel (who may be employees of the Company), independent
accountants and other persons as to matters which the Committee believes to be
within such persons&#146; professional or expert competence.&#160; The Committee shall be fully protected with
respect to any action taken or omitted by it in </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_18_192145_7056"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=22,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=456746,FOLIO='18',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-05_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:03 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">good faith pursuant to the advice of such
persons.&#160; The Committee may delegate
ministerial, bookkeeping and other non-discretionary functions to individuals
who are officers or employees of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">6.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Indemnity and Liability</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
All expenses of the Committee shall be paid by the Company and the
Company shall furnish the Committee with such clerical and other assistance as
is necessary in the performance of its duties.&#160;
No member of the Committee shall be liable for any act or omission of
any other member of the Committee nor for any act or omission on his or her own
part, excepting only his or her own willful misconduct or gross
negligence.&#160; To the extent permitted by
law, the Company shall indemnify and save harmless each member of the Committee
against any and all expenses and liabilities arising out of his or her
membership on the Committee, excepting only expenses and liabilities arising
out of his or her own willful misconduct or gross negligence, as determined by
the Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE VII</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>PLAN CHANGES AND TERMINATION</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Board of Directors shall have the right to amend this Plan in whole or in part
from time to time or may at any time suspend or terminate this Plan.&#160; In addition, The Committee may amend the Plan
to (a)&nbsp;ensure that this Plan complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code for deferral of taxation on compensation deferred hereunder after December&nbsp;31,
2004 until the time of distribution and (b)&nbsp;to make other changes to the
provisions regarding elections as to the time and manner of distributions that
comply with such requirements of Section&nbsp;409A.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, no amendment
or termination shall cancel or otherwise adversely affect in any way, without
his or her written consent, any Eligible Director&#146;s rights with respect to
Stock Units and Dividend Equivalents credited to his or her Stock Unit Account,
Dividend Equivalent Cash Account or Dividend Equivalent Stock Account which are
then vested (assuming solely for such purposes a voluntary termination of
services as of the date of such amendment or termination) or to any amounts
previously credited to his or her Cash Account; provided, however, that in no
event shall such consent be required for an amendment that is necessary to
comply with applicable law, including without limitation, an amendment required
under Section&nbsp;409A of the Code or the regulations thereunder to preserve
the deferral of taxation on compensation deferred hereunder until the time of
distribution.&#160; Any amendments authorized
hereby shall be stated in an instrument in writing, and all Eligible Directors
shall be bound thereby upon receipt of notice thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">It is
the current expectation of the Company that this Plan shall be continued until August&nbsp;1,
2029, but continuance of this Plan is not assumed as a contractual obligation
of the Company.&#160; In the event that the
Board of Directors decides to discontinue or terminate this Plan, it shall
notify the Committee and participants in this Plan of its action in an
instrument in writing, and this Plan shall be terminated at the time therein
set forth, and all participants shall be bound thereby.&#160; In such event, the then vested benefits of an
Eligible Director shall be distributed in accordance with the time and manner
of distribution elected by him or her under Section&nbsp;5.5 and/or 5.5A.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_19_192200_5335"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=23,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=240016,FOLIO='19',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-05_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:03 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE VIII</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><br>
<u>MISCELLANEOUS</u></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.1</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Limitation on Eligible Directors&#146;
Rights</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Participation in this Plan shall not give any
Eligible Director the right to continue to serve as a member of the Board of
Directors or any rights or interests other than as herein provided.&#160; No Eligible Director shall have any right to
any payment or benefit hereunder except to the extent provided in this
Plan.&#160; This Plan shall create only a
contractual obligation on the part of the Company as to such amounts and shall
not be construed as creating a trust.&#160;
This Plan, in and of itself, has no assets.&#160; Eligible Directors shall have only the rights
of general unsecured creditors of the Company with respect to amounts credited
or vested and benefits payable, if any, on their Accounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.2</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Beneficiaries</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Beneficiary Designation</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Upon forms provided by the Company each Eligible Director may designate
in writing the Beneficiary or Beneficiaries (as defined in Section&nbsp;8.2(b))
whom such Eligible Director desires to receive any amounts payable under this
Plan after his or her death.&#160; An Eligible
Director from may from time to time change his or her designated Beneficiary or
Beneficiaries without the consent of such Beneficiary or Beneficiaries by
filing a new designation in writing with the Committee.&#160; However, if a married Eligible Director
wishes to designate a person other than his or her spouse as Beneficiary, such
designation shall be consented to in writing by the spouse.&#160; The Eligible Director may change any election
designating a Beneficiary or Beneficiaries without any requirement of further
spousal consent if the spouse&#146;s consent so provides.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, spousal
consent shall not be necessary if it is established that the required consent
cannot be obtained because the spouse cannot be located or because of other
circumstances prescribed by the Committee.&#160;
The Company and the Committee may rely on the Eligible Director&#146;s
designation of a Beneficiary or Beneficiaries last filed in accordance with the
terms of this Plan.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Definition of Beneficiary</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
An Eligible Director&#146;s &#147;Beneficiary&#148; or &#147;Beneficiaries&#148; shall be the
person, persons, trust or trusts so designated by the Eligible Director or, in
the absence of such designation, entitled by will or the laws of descent and
distribution to receive the Eligible Director&#146;s benefits under this Plan in the
event of the Eligible Director&#146;s death, and shall mean the Eligible Director&#146;s
executor or administrator if no other Beneficiary is identified and able to act
under the circumstances.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.3</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Benefits Not Assignable; Obligations
Binding Upon Successors</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Benefits of
an Eligible Director under this Plan shall not be assignable or transferable
and any purported transfer, assignment, pledge or other encumbrance or
attachment of any payments or benefits under this Plan, or any interest
therein, other than by operation of law or pursuant to Section&nbsp;8.2, shall
not be permitted or recognized.&#160;
Obligations of the Company under this Plan shall be binding upon
successors of the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.4</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Governing Law; Severability</font></u></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;
The validity of this Plan or any of its provisions shall be construed,
administered and governed in all respects under and by </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_20_192215_5796"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the laws of the state of incorporation of the
Company.&#160; If any provisions of this
instrument shall be held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid or
unenforceable, the remaining provisions hereof shall continue to be fully
effective.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Compliance With Laws</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
This Plan and the offer, issuance and delivery of shares of Common Stock
and/or the payment of money through the deferral of compensation under this
Plan are subject to compliance with all applicable federal and state laws, rules&nbsp;and
regulations (including but not limited to state and federal securities law) and
to such approvals by any listing, agency or any regulatory or governmental
authority as may, in the opinion of counsel for the Company, be necessary or
advisable in connection therewith.&#160; Any
securities delivered under this Plan shall be subject to such restrictions, and
the person acquiring such securities shall, if requested by the Company,
provide such assurances and representations to the Company as the Company may
deem necessary or desirable to assure compliance with all applicable legal
requirements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">8.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Headings Not Part&nbsp;of Plan</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Headings and subheadings in this Plan are inserted for reference only
and are not to be considered in the construction of the provisions hereof.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_21_192223_2897"></a></font></p>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=25,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=27141,FOLIO='21',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-05_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:03 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">APPENDIX A</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The provisions set forth in this Appendix A set forth
the provisions of Section&nbsp;5.5A of the Plan which apply to the distribution
of amounts deferred prior to January&nbsp;1, 2005 and credited to Prior Cash
Accounts, Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Accounts, Prior Dividend Equivalent
Stock Accounts and Prior Stock Unit Accounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">5.5A</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Distribution of Benefits</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(a)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Time and Manner of Distribution</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Each Eligible Director shall be entitled to receive a distribution of
the vested portion of his or her Accounts upon his or her termination from
service on the Board of Directors or at such time as may be elected by the
Eligible Director at the time of an election under Article&nbsp;IV and set
forth in writing on forms provided by the Company.&#160; The benefits payable under this Plan shall be
distributed to the Eligible Director (or, in the event of his or her death, the
Eligible Director&#146;s Beneficiary) in a lump sum or, if elected by the Eligible
Director in writing on forms provided by the Company at least 12 months in
advance of the date benefits become distributable under subsection (a), in
annual installments for up to 10 years.&#160;
An Eligible Director shall be permitted to make a different election
with respect to each annual deferral period as to the time and manner in which
his or her benefits shall be distributed.&#160;
For each Eligible Director who makes one or more distribution elections
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5A(a), each of his or her Accounts shall be
divided into two or more Distribution Subaccounts as necessary to separately
account for deferrals which are payable at different times and/or in different
manners.&#160; For purposes of calculating installments,
the Eligible Director&#146;s vested Accounts (and Distribution Subaccounts if
applicable) will be valued as of December&nbsp;31 of each year, and divided by
the number of remaining installments to determine the amount of the installment
to be paid in the following year.&#160;
Subsequent installments will be adjusted accordingly for the next
calendar year, according to procedures established by the Committee.&#160; Such installment payments shall commence as
of the date benefits become distributable under this Section&nbsp;5.5A(a).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(b)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Change in Time or Manner of
Distribution</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Notwithstanding subsection (a):</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">An Eligible Director may elect to further defer the
commencement of any distribution to be made with respect to benefits payable
under this Plan by filing a new written election with the Committee on a form
approved by the Committee; provided, however, that (A)&nbsp;no such new
election shall be effective until 12 months after such election is filed with
the Committee, (B)&nbsp;no such new election shall be effective with respect to
any Account(s)&nbsp;after the distribution of benefits with respect to such
Account(s)&nbsp;shall have commenced, and (C)&nbsp;no more than three new
elections with respect to each annual deferral period shall be valid as to any
Eligible Director.&#160; An election made
pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5A(b)(1)&nbsp;shall not affect the manner of
distribution (i.e., lump </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-1<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_1_192237_3020"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=26,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=668363,FOLIO='A-1',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-05_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:03 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">sum versus
installments), the terms of which shall be subject to Section&nbsp;5.5A(a)&nbsp;above
or Section&nbsp;5.5A(b)(2)&nbsp;below.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">An Eligible Director may change the manner of any
distribution election from a lump sum to annual installments (or vice versa)
made with respect to amounts credited under his or her Accounts by filing a
written election with the Committee on a form provided by the Committee;
provided, however, that no such election shall be effective until 12 months
after such election is filed with the Committee, and no such election shall be
effective if it is made with respect to any Account(s)&nbsp;after the
distribution of benefits with respect to such Account(s)&nbsp;have
commenced.&#160; An election made pursuant to
this Section&nbsp;5.5A(b)(2)&nbsp;shall not affect the date of the commencement
of benefits.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On or before September&nbsp;30, 2000, an Eligible
Director may make a one-time, irrevocable election (subject to other express
provisions of this Plan), on forms provided for this purpose, to receive a
distribution of his or her accumulated balances under this Plan as of September&nbsp;30,
2000 on:&#160; (A)&nbsp;a date elected by the
Eligible Director, but in no event before 2003, or (B)&nbsp;the earlier of a
date elected by the Eligible Director, but in no event before 2003, or the date
of his or her termination of service from the Board of Directors.&#160; The benefits payable under such an election
shall be distributed to the Eligible Director (or in the event of his or her
death, the Eligible Director&#146;s Beneficiary) in a lump sum or, if elected by the
Eligible Director in writing on forms provided by the Company at least 12
months in advance of the date benefits become distributable under Section&nbsp;5.5A(a)&nbsp;above,
in annual installments for up to 10 years, as so elected.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(c)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Effect of Change in Control Event</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Notwithstanding subsections (a)&nbsp;and (b), if a Change in Control
Event and a termination of service occurs, the vested portions of an Eligible
Director&#146;s Accounts shall be distributed immediately in a lump sum.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(d)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Early Distributions</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Each Eligible Director (which for purposes of this Section&nbsp;5.5A(d)&nbsp;includes
former Eligible Directors) shall be permitted to elect to withdraw not less
than 50% of the vested portion of his or her Accounts, reduced by the
withdrawal penalty described below, prior to the applicable payment date(s)&nbsp;or
payment commencement date(s)&nbsp;(&#147;Early Distributions&#148;), subject to the
following restrictions:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The election to take an Early Distribution shall be
made in writing on a form provided by and filed with the Committee;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The amount of the Early Distribution shall equal 90%
of the amount the Eligible Director has elected to withdraw; and</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-2<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_2_192247_7748"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=27,EFW="2196442",CP="THE MACERICH COMPANY",DN="4",CHK=521244,FOLIO='A-2',FILE="DISK133:[10ZAC2.10ZAC10802]1608-2-KQ-05_ZAC10802.CHC",USER="JFUSS",CD='Feb 14 00:03 2010' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The remaining 10% of the amount the Eligible Director
has elected to withdraw shall be permanently forfeited, and the Eligible
Director or his or her Beneficiary shall have no rights with respect to such
forfeited amounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding
the foregoing, the Eligible Director&#146;s Accounts will continue to vest in
accordance with Section&nbsp;5.4 and the Dividend Equivalent Stock Account
and/or Dividend Equivalent Cash Account of such Eligible Director shall
continue to be credited with Dividend Equivalents in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.3.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(e)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Distribution for Unforeseeable
Emergencies</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; An Eligible Director (which for purposes of
this Section&nbsp;5.5A(e)&nbsp;includes former Eligible Directors) may request
a distribution for an Unforeseeable Emergency without penalty of an amount not
greater than the value of the Eligible Director&#146;s vested benefit under this
Plan.&#160; Such distribution for an
Unforeseeable Emergency shall be subject to approval by the Committee in its
sole discretion and may be made only to the extent necessary to satisfy the
hardship and only from vested amounts credited to his or her Accounts.&#160; The Committee may treat a distribution as
necessary for an Unforeseeable Emergency if it relies on the Eligible Director&#146;s
written representation, without actual knowledge to the contrary, that the
hardship cannot reasonably be relieved (1)&nbsp;through timely reimbursement or
compensation by insurance or otherwise or (2)&nbsp;by liquidation of the
Eligible Director&#146;s assets, to the extent the liquidation of such assets would
not itself cause severe financial hardship.&#160;
Amounts distributed pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.5A(e)&nbsp;shall be
distributed first from an Eligible Director&#146;s Cash and Dividend Equivalent Cash
Accounts, and, to the extent the balance of the Participant&#146;s Cash and Dividend
Equivalent Cash Accounts is not sufficient to satisfy the severe financial
hardship, next as a distribution of shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock with a
Fair Market Value equal to such deficiency from the vested portion of such
Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit and Dividend Equivalent Stock Accounts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(f)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Form&nbsp;of Distribution</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Stock Units credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Stock Unit Account and
Dividend Equivalent Stock Account shall be distributed in an equivalent whole
number of shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock.&#160;
Fractions shall be disregarded.&#160;
Amounts credited to an Eligible Director&#146;s Cash Account and vested in
the Eligible Director&#146;s Dividend Equivalent Cash Account shall be distributed
in cash.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">(g)</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></b><b><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Small Benefit Exception</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160;
Notwithstanding any other provision of this Plan to the contrary, if at
the time of any distribution the vested balance remaining in an Eligible
Director&#146;s Prior Cash Account or Prior Dividend Equivalent Cash Account is less
than $2,000 or, if the number of vested Units credited to the Eligible Director&#146;s
Prior Stock Unit Account or Prior Dividend Equivalent Stock Account is less
than 100, then such remaining vested balances shall be distributed in a lump
sum.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-3<a name="1608-2-KQ-05_PB_3_192252_141"></a></font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

<BR>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
10.39</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Description
of Director and Executive Compensation Arrangements</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">A.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Non-Employee Director Compensation.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Annual Retainer for Service on
the Board</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 27.0pt;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#183;</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">$60,000 payable in quarterly installments.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Symbol" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#183;</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Shares of restricted stock equal to $75,000 based upon the closing
price of our common stock on the NYSE on the date of the grant. Restricted
stock is granted in March&nbsp;of each year and vests over three years.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;text-align:left;text-indent:-.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Annual Retainer for Chairman of
the Audit, Compensation and Nominating&nbsp;&amp; Corporate Governance Committees</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;"> - $25,000.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;text-align:left;"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Annual Committee Membership Fees</font></u></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;"> - $12,500 for each Committee (non-chair members).</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="left" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;text-align:left;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">Each grant of restricted stock is
made pursuant to the Company&#146;s 2003 Equity Incentive Plan.&#160; In addition, the Director Phantom Stock Plan
offers non-employee directors the opportunity to defer cash compensation for up
to three years and to receive that compensation (to the extent that it is
actually earned by service during that period) in shares of common stock rather
than in cash after termination of service or a predetermined period. Such
compensation includes the annual retainer, committee chair and committee membership
fees.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

executive officers who are named executive officers in the Company&#146;s Proxy
Statement as of January&nbsp;1, 2010 are as follows:</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .35in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The
Company has an annual incentive compensation program for our executive officers
under which bonuses, which may be in the form of cash and/or equity awards, are
granted to reflect corporate and individual performance during the prior
calendar year. The actual bonus amounts granted are determined by the
Compensation Committee in its discretion based on its assessment of corporate
and individual performance for each executive officer.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 31.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#10ZAC10801_8">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_ko10801_1_164"> </A> </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->





<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


</FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko10801_exhibit_31.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko10801_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;31.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko10801_section_302_certification"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko10801_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  SECTION&nbsp;302 CERTIFICATION    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Arthur M. Coppola, certify that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009 of The Macerich Company;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the
financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and
15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that
material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is
being prepared;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting
principles;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the registrant's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of
the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Disclosed
in this report any change in the registrant's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant's most recent fiscal
quarter (the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant's internal control over
financial reporting; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>
</DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
registrant's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
registrant's auditors and the audit committee of the registrant's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect the registrant's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant's internal control over
financial reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:100%;margin-left:0%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>

<TYPE>EX-32.1

<FILENAME>a2196442zex-32_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 32.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#10ZAC10801_10">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_kr10801_1_166"> </A> </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kr10801_exhibit_32.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kr10801_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;32.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kr10801_the_macerich_company_(the_comp__the02973"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kr10801_2"> </A></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>  THE MACERICH COMPANY (The Company)<BR>  WRITTEN STATEMENT PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The undersigned, Arthur&nbsp;M. Coppola and Thomas&nbsp;E. O'Hern, the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial Officer,
respectively, of The Macerich Company (the "Company"), pursuant to 18&nbsp;U.S.C.&nbsp;&sect;1350, each hereby certify that, to the best of his knowledge: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(i)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the
Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009 of the Company (the "Report") fully complies with the
requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) and 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(ii)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:100%;margin-left:0%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>
